{{ PROJECT_NAME }}

This is a template for a simple web application in Django.

Create your Account!

Start Now!

Quickstartup provides the basic components and design to start your web application quickly.

Go Live!

Quickstartup includes deployment script for the major Django host providers. You can put your application online with one command.

Customize!

Quickstartup is highly customizable. You can change almost everything in functionalities provided by Quickstartup.
